author: Tanveer Mann
title: McCanns blast Marco Pierre White Jnr for shocking rant about Maddie
text:
Kate and Gerry McCann have blasted Marco Pierre White Junior for his sick rant about their daughter Madeleine (Picture: PA) The parents of missing Madeleine McCann have hit back at a Twitter rant by Marco Pierre White Junior, in which he accused them of being ‘guilty sick mother f s’. 
Madeleine McCann ‘died in apartment’ claims expert Kate, 49, and Gerry McCann, 48, said the 22-year-old reality star’s shocking outburst was ‘entirely unjustified’.
They added that they hope ‘any right minded person will see his totally ignorant abuse for what it is.’
Marco tweeted the rant on Thursday to his 40,000 followers, ahead of the 10th anniversary of Maddie’s disappearance in May 2011.
Marco Pierre White Junior, 22, called the couple ‘f g guilty sick mother f s’ (Picture: Rex) He wrote: ‘Kate and Gerry MacCann are f g guilty sick mother f s defiantly killed there daughter. Look at money (dollar sign) they’ve made out of it in 10 years’.
The McCann’s spokesman Clarence Mitchell responded to the rant, telling The Sun Online: ‘Kate and Gerry will not be dignifying his foul-mouthed abuse with any other comment.’
MORE: Madeleine McCann search given £85,000 and extended for six months 
The tweets still appear on Marco’s Twitter feed (Picture: Twitter/mpw_jnr) (Picture: Twitter/mpw_jr) In Marco’s rant, he mis-spelt the family’s surname, wrote ‘there’ daughter instead of ‘their’ and used a dollar sign instead of a pound sign.
Karen Matthews ‘almost duped Madeleine McCann fund out of £25,000’ A source close to Kate, 49, and Gerry 48, from Rothley, told the paper: ‘He comes across as a complete and utter idiot. His father must be appalled by his behaviour.
‘But even mentioning him and like-minded people might give them some sort of spurious credibility.’
‘As if Madeleine’s poor parents didn’t have enough to deal with. It’s nearly a decade since their beloved daughter disappeared and they still have no idea if she is dead or alive.’
In Marco’s rant, he mis-spelt the family’s surname, wrote ‘there’ daughter instead of ‘their’ and used a dollar sign instead of a pound sign. (Picture: Rex) Maddie vanished from the family’s holiday apartment in Portugal’s Praia da Luz in May 2007 while her parents went for dinner in a nearby tapas bar.
The couple still believe their daughter, who would now be 13 years old, is alive and previously said they wouldn’t give up hope until they see evidence.
Madeleine McCann vanished from the family’s holiday apartment in Portugal’s Praia da Luz in May 2007 while her parents went for dinner in a nearby tapas bar. MORE: British woman ‘secretly buys apartment where Madeleine McCann vanished’ 
Earlier this week, Scotland Yard was granted an extra £85,000 to fund the search for another six months.
But the investigation, codenamed Operation Grange, has repeatedly been criticised over the past few years as it has failed to unearth any new evidence, despite it running at a near £13 million cost to the taxpayer.
